job_title: Nhân viên Kho - cấp bậc tổ trưởng (làm ca)
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH LEGO MANUFACTURING VIỆT NAM
fields: Vận chuyển / Giao nhận /  Kho vận
job_description:
Mô tả Công việc
Vị trí Nhân viên Kho tại LEGO Manufacturing Việt Nam sẽ làm việc theo ca, chịu trách nhiệm chính trong việc đào tạo nhân viên và hỗ trợ sản xuất nhằm đảm bảo đạt được các mục tiêu đề ra, đồng thời tuân thủ các nguyên tắc về chất lượng và an toàn lao động.
Bạn mong muốn được làm việc tại một môi trường năng động, sáng tạo và nhiều cơ hội phát triển? Hãy gửi đơn ứng tuyển ngay hôm nay để bắt đầu hành trình thú vị cùng LEGO Manufacturing Việt Nam!
Mô tả công việc:
Đào tạo nhân viên mới 
Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý nhóm trong các hoạt động vận hành kho.  
Chủ động liên hệ với các bên liên quan để giải quyết/báo cáo khi có bất kỳ vấn đề nào xảy ra.
Đảm bảo tiến trình xuất nguyên vật liệu diễn ra đúng tiến độ dựa trên nhu cầu và yêu cầu của các bộ phận khác trong nhà máy.  
Lái xe nâng các loại, bao gồm xe nâng kệ.
Bốc dỡ và xếp hàng hóa vào kho.
Nhận và xuất nguyên vật liệu ra/vào kho.
Phối hợp chặt chẽ với TC, GJT/FAMT (Tổ chức đào tạo) để xem xét quy trình và tài liệu liên quan đến quy trình.
Đề xuất cải tiến quy trình.
Hiểu và sử dụng Hệ thống Quản lý Kho (COMBI), hệ thống này được sử dụng cho tất các hoạt động nhập/ xuất nguyên vật liệu qua máy scan hoặc máy tính.  
Tuân thủ chặt chẽ các quy định an toàn, đặc biệt khi lái xe nâng.
Tuân thủ quy trình làm việc, trật tự trong nơi làm việc và tất cả các quy tắc an toàn & vệ sinh.  
Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý thiết bị kho và các tài sản khác trong bộ phận kho.  
Báo cáo kịp thời cho quản lý về tình hình kho/các trường hợp không tuân thủ.
Hoàn thành các nhiệm vụ khác được giao. 
Tuân thủ 5S.
requirements:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Yêu cầu công việc:
Tốt nghiệp cấp 3 trở lên.
Kinh nghiệm làm việc ở Kho ít nhất 1 năm.
Có kinh nghiệm và có bằng lái xe nâng.
Không sợ độ cao.
Có khả năng đào tạo cho nhân viên khác.
Khả năng giao tiếp tốt.
Thái độ tích cực.
Hợp tác và làm việc nhóm tốt.
Sẵn sàng và có khả năng học hỏi kiến thức mới.
Chủ động tiếp cận vấn đề.
Có khả năng nhận biết và báo cáo vấn đề.
Linh hoạt, có khả năng thích nghi và chấp nhận thay đổi.
Khả năng chịu được áp lực.
Có kinh nghiệm đào tạo.
Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng hệ thống SAP.

job_title: Trợ Lý Hành Chính Sản Xuất

fields: Sản xuất / Vận hành sản xuất
job_description:
Mô tả Công việc
* Please scroll down for the English version
Mô tả công việc:
Giám sát và quản lý các hoạt động sản xuất liên quan đến 5S, Kanban, kiểm toán và đào tạo nhân viên:
1. Khu Vực Sản Xuất:
• Triển khai và duy trì các hoạt động 5S và Kanban trong các khu vực được giao.
• Quản lý đơn đặt hàng và giao nhận các vật dụng 5S, lập kế hoạch sơn hoặc thay đổi bố trí dây chuyền.
• Đảm bảo khu vực 5S luôn sạch sẽ và duy trì nhãn dán trên các dây chuyền.
• Đặt đơn mua hàng cho các vật liệu cần thiết và thực hiện kiểm toán 5S để xác định và giải quyết các vấn đề.
• Báo cáo về việc thực hiện và cải tiến 5S, đồng thời đào tạo nhân viên về việc thực hiện 5S.
• Phối hợp với các nhà cung cấp bên ngoài để sửa chữa tủ, ghế và bàn khi cần.
2. Khu vực Văn phòng của bộ phận:
• Đặt hàng văn phòng phẩm và quản lý chìa khóa tủ và phòng thay đồ.
• Duy trì bảng thông báo và phối hợp sửa chữa nội thất văn phòng với các nhà cung cấp bên ngoài.
• Hoàn thành các nhiệm vụ khác do cấp trên giao.
Vị trí này chịu trách nhiệm thực hiện các công việc hành chính cần thiết để hỗ trợ hoạt động sản xuất diễn ra suôn sẻ, đảm bảo an toàn, chất lượng và giao hàng đúng hạn nhằm đáp ứng nhu cầu linh hoạt cao của khách hàng.
Job Description:
Oversee and manage production activities related to 5S, Kanban, audits, and employee training:
Production Halls:
• Implement and maintain 5S and Kanban practices in assigned areas.
• Manage orders and delivery of 5S items and plan line painting or layout changes.
• Ensure cleanliness in 5S zones and maintain labels on lines.
• Place purchase orders for necessary materials and conduct 5S audits to identify and resolve issues.
• Report on 5S implementation and improvements, and train employees on 5S practices.
• Coordinate with external suppliers to repair cabinets, chairs, and tables as needed.
Packing Offices:
• Order office supplies and manage locker/dressing room keys.
• Maintain bulletin boards and coordinate repairs for office furniture with external suppliers.
requirements:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Yêu cầu:
• Tốt nghiệp ít nhất Trung học phổ thông hoặc trung cấp nghề.
• Có kinh nghiệm làm việc trong môi trường sản xuất
• Kỹ năng giao tiếp: hợp tác, làm việc nhóm, thái độ chủ động và tinh thần hỗ trợ
• Kỹ năng tin học văn phòng (MS. Office)
• Có kinh nghiệm làm ca
• Kỹ năng tiếng Anh cơ bản
Do you have what it takes?
• Prefer graduating from High school 12/12, secondary vocational school
• Have working experience in Manufacturing environment
• Interpersonal skills: collaboration, teamwork, proactive and service attitude, personal and professional ethics.
• Computer skill to print document, place PR on Coupa system.
• Have Shift-working experience is preferred
• Production Administrator
What’s in it for you?
Here is what you can expect:
Family Care Leave - We offer enhanced paid leave options for those important times.
Insurances – All colleagues are covered by our life and disability insurance which provides protection and peace of mind.
Wellbeing - We want our people to feel well and thrive. We offer resources and benefits to nurture physical and mental wellbeing along with opportunities to build community and inspire creativity.
Colleague Discount – We know you'll love to build, so from day 1 you will qualify for our generous colleague discount.
Bonus - We do our best work to succeed together. When goals are reached and if eligible, you'll be rewarded through our bonus scheme.
Workplace - When you join the team you'll be assigned a primary workplace location i.e. one of our Offices, stores or factories. The hiring team will discuss our hybrid work policy and role eligibility with you during the recruitment process.
Children are our role models. Their curiosity, creativity and imagination inspire everything we do. We strive to create a diverse, dynamic and inclusive culture of play at the LEGO Group, where everyone feels safe, valued and they belong.
The LEGO Group is highly committed to equal employment opportunity and equal pay and seeks to encourage applicants from all backgrounds (eg. sex, gender identity or expression, race/ethnicity, national origin, sexual orientation, disability, age and religion) to apply for roles in our team.

job_title: Chuyên viên quản trị, vận hành hạ tầng VDI (System Admin)  - Khối Công nghệ thông tin (HO24.316)
job_description:
Mô tả Công việc
Quản lý và vận hành hệ thống VMware VDI:
Xây dựng, cài đặt, cấu hình và tối ưu hóa các thành phần của môi trường ảo hóa VMware VDI, bao gồm VMware Horizon và VMware vSphere.
Đảm bảo hoạt động ổn định của hệ thống:
Theo dõi và bảo trì hệ thống VDI nhằm đảm bảo hiệu suất tối ưu, đồng thời xử lý các sự cố và giải quyết vấn đề phát sinh.
Hỗ trợ người dùng cuối:
Cung cấp hỗ trợ kỹ thuật cho người dùng cuối trong môi trường VDI, đảm bảo kết nối và hoạt động của các máy ảo.
Tối ưu hóa tài nguyên:
Theo dõi hiệu suất của các tài nguyên (CPU, RAM, lưu trữ) để đảm bảo phân bổ tài nguyên hợp lý trong môi trường ảo hóa.
Triển khai và nâng cấp hệ thống:
Đảm bảo hệ thống luôn cập nhật phiên bản mới nhất, tuân thủ các tiêu chuẩn bảo mật, nâng cấp và vá lỗi phần mềm khi cần thiết.
Thiết lập chính sách bảo mật và sao lưu:
Thực hiện các biện pháp bảo mật cho hệ thống VMware VDI, đảm bảo sao lưu và khôi phục dữ liệu khi cần thiết.
requirements:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Hệ thống thông tin, hoặc các ngành liên quan.
Các chứng chỉ liên quan như VMware VCP-DCV (VMware Certified Professional – Data Center Virtualization) là một lợi thế.
Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với hệ thống VMware, đặc biệt là VMware Horizon và vSphere.
Hiểu biết sâu rộng về môi trường VDI, cấu trúc ảo hóa, quản trị tài nguyên và bảo mật trong môi trường ảo.
Có khả năng xử lý sự cố (troubleshooting) và tinh chỉnh hiệu suất hệ thống VMware VDI
Kỹ năng phân tích, giải quyết vấn đề và làm việc nhóm tốt.
Có khả năng làm việc độc lập, quản lý công việc hiệu quả và linh hoạt trong xử lý tình huống.

company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH PHẦN MỀM TIẾP THỊ VIDEO QUỐC TẾ
job_description:
Mô tả Công việc
Thiết kế, triển khai và quản lý các cụm Kubernetes trên GKE.
Phát triển và duy trì cơ sở hạ tầng bằng Terraform.
Tự động hóa quy trình triển khai để nâng cao hiệu quả và độ tin cậy.
Giám sát và tối ưu hóa hiệu suất hệ thống, tính sẵn sàng và khả năng mở rộng.
Thực hiện các thực tiễn bảo mật tốt nhất và đảm bảo tuân thủ các tiêu chuẩn ngành.
Khắc phục sự cố và giải quyết các vấn đề trên các môi trường phát triển, kiểm thử và sản xuất.
Hợp tác với dev để đảm bảo CI/CD cho các ứng dụng.
Duy trì tài liệu liên quan đến cơ sở hạ tầng và các quy trình vận hành.
Cập nhật với các xu hướng và công nghệ mới nhất trong ngành để liên tục cải thiện hệ thống
requirements:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Có ít nhất 1-2 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực DevOps, hoặc vị trí tương tự.
Kinh nghiệm thực hành với Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE).
Thành thạo Terraform.
Hiểu biết sâu sắc về Kubernetes và điều phối container.
Kinh nghiệm với các công cụ và quy trình CI/CD.
Thành thạo ngôn ngữ kịch bản như Bash hoặc tương tự.
Kiến thức về các nền tảng đám mây, đặc biệt là Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Quen thuộc với các công cụ giám sát và ghi nhật ký (ví dụ: Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack).
Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề mạnh mẽ và chú ý đến chi tiết.
Kỹ năng giao tiếp và hợp tác xuất sắc
QUYỀN LỢI
Môi trường làm việc năng động, sáng tạo, chuyên nghiệp.
Có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến trong công việc, được đào tạo các kỹ năng mềm khác;
Trang thiết bị chuyên môn đầy đủ, phục vụ cho nhu cầu công việc.
Các chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN, nghỉ phép, lương tháng 13,... được đảm bảo cho nhân viên
Review lương 2 lần 1 năm vào T4 và T10
Tham gia các hoạt động cùng công ty hàng năm.
Thời gian làm việc: 09:00- 18:00 từ thứ Hai tới thứ Sáu, không OT
